language.title: Language name
language.description:
For example:
  - Python
  - Java
  - PHP
  - JavaScript

code.title: Code
code.description: Code, contain nessecary indentation and line breaks.

date.title: Partial date
date.description:
A date, where the month and/or day may not be known/available.

For example:
  - 2016
  - 2016-09
  - 2016-09-16

mediaCard.title: Whether to display the media card.

authorLine.description:
For example:
    - Ian T Baldwin
    - Randy Schekman, Mark Patterson
    - Lee R Berger, John Hawks ... Scott A Williams

published.title: Publication date (UTC)
published.description:
Date and time this reviewed-preprint was first published.
Not present if 'stage' is 'preview'.

versionDate.description: Date and time this version of the article was published.

statusDate.description: Date and time this article transitioned to current status.

focalPoint.title: Focal point
focalPoint.description:
Point on the image that is considered to be the focal point of the image.

If not present, 50 can be used for both `x` and `y`.
